description: You ignore the limitations of your equipment, striking harder despite the damage it does to your weapon.

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Base attack bonus +1, proficient with weapon.

sections.text: Whenever you use a melee or thrown weapon with the fragile weapon special quality to score a critical threat against an opponent, you can give your weapon the broken condition to automatically confirm the critical hit.
sections.name: Benefits

name: Disposable Weapon
